prompt: You are a modern furniture product designer creating clean product photography. Clean white studio background, professional lighting, high resolution, minimalist composition. Remove all text, remove all words, remove all letters, remove all typography, remove all branding items, remove all labels completely from the image. A single piece of Pure furniture only, no graphic design elements.IMPORTANT: Do not include any text, labels, words, letters, or typography in the image.
